adjustment types for To create a new bank adjustment type, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new bank adjustment type, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a name to describe the bank adjustment type.
Enter a description to further describe the bank adjustment type.
Specify the account to be used for the bank adjustment type.

note.para: By default, the screen will limit your account number choices to only those accounts having the correct account type for the chosen context. However, privileged users may override this default behavior by manually entering any account number listed in the chart of accounts.

listitem.para: Define the sense of the bank adjustment type by selecting one of the following:
Select if the bank adjustment should increase your bank account balance.
Select if the bank adjustment should decrease your bank account balance.
